name: fl3xu5' blog
body:
### Welcome to My Home Page
I’d like to introduce my self. My name is M.Syarifudin. Some of my friends call me Rif, Syarif, or fl3xu5 . Male twenty something years old from Indonesia, graduated from STT Telkom / IT Telkom with a Bachelor of Telecommunication Engineering. 

I’m currently working as an Assistant Manager of IPTV Operation Division ( Broadcast Operation ) in one of the largest Telecommunication companies in Indonesia since 2011. Previously I worked as a Lecturer of Network & System Administrator course ( 2010 - 2011 ) and as a Technical Consultant & Network Engineer ( 2009 - 2010 ) in one of the Information Technology company. 

I’m experienced on BackTrack Linux and Kali Linux. I’m a speaker and trainer of BackTrack Linux & Penetration Testing seminar and training held by some universities, government, and training centre in Indonesia over 5 years. I’ve posted many articles related to BackTrack Linux and Kali Linux into my blog ( http://fl3x.us/blog/ ) and seminar / training slides into slideshare.net ( http://www.slideshare.net/fl3xu5/ ).

Beside that, I’m an Apple Freak :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
